T10TD4179E:35b-1: saddharma smri ti au pasth'a na k'a ri k'a /
T10TD4179E:35b-3: dam pa'i chos dran ba nye bar gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa //
T10TD4179E:35b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T10TD4179E:35b-5: yon tan ldan zhing dbab bya phebs ;
T10TD4179E:35b-6: / yang dag ye shes snang ba ldan //
T10TD4179E:35b-7: rtag tu gzhan gyi don mdzad pa //
T10TD4179E:35b-9: gang la byed po gzhan med pa //
T10TD4179E:35b-10: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las //
T10TD4179E:35b-11: dge dang mi dge rang byas gang //
T10TD4179E:35b-14: 'jig rten mkhyen pa thugs brtses non //
T10TD4179E:35b-15: 'jig rten gsum gtso gcig po nyid //
T10TD4179E:35b-16: 'gro ba'i don du las gang dang //
T10TD4179E:35b-17: 'bras bu gang dag yin gsung ba //
T10TD4179E:35b-18: de ni bdag gis mdor bshad kyi //
T10TD4179E:35b-19: khyod kyis nyon la dam pa dang //
T10TD4179E:35b-20: dam pa min ba'i rgyu yi las //
T10TD4179E:35b-21: bya ba dang ni spangs pa'i rigs //
T10TD4179E:35b-22: chags sdang gti mug 'jigs dang khro //
T10TD4179E:35b-23: mi gang mi ni gsod pa dang //
T10TD4179E:35b-24: gzhan yang bskyed nas gsod byed ba //
T10TD4179E:35b-25: de dag nges par yang sos 'gro //
T10TD4179E:35b-26: gang gi phyir na lo stong phrag / mang por yang ni de dag tu //
T10TD4179E:35b-27: btags shing btags shing yang 'tsho bas //
T10TD4179E:35b-28: de phyir yang sos yin par bshad ;
T10TD4179E:35b-29: / pha ma dang ni grogs dang gnyen //
T10TD4179E:35b-30: bshes gnyen dang ni 'khu byed dang //
T10TD4179E:35b-31: phra ma brdzun ni smra ba'i mi //
T10TD4179E:35b-33: gang phyir de la shing bzhin du //
T10TD4179E:35b-34: thig nag btab nas sog le dang //
T10TD4179E:35b-35: 'bar ba yis ni gshog byed de //
T10TD4179E:36a-0: de phyir thig nag yin par @36a * //
T10TD4179E:36a-2: / ra dang lug dang wa dag dang //
T10TD4179E:36a-3: ri bong byi ba ri dags phag / gzhan yang bskyed nas gsod byas na //
T10TD4179E:36a-5: gang phyir bsdus nas der 'dor nas //
T10TD4179E:36a-6: yang dag sreg par byed pas na //
T10TD4179E:36a-7: de yi phyir ni bsdus 'joms te//
T10TD4179E:36a-8: de ltar ming ni don mthun drag /'dir ni lus can gang dag gis //
T10TD4179E:36a-9: lus dang dag yid nyon mongs byed //
T10TD4179E:36a-10: gang dag lhang 'jug gzhan g-yo byed //
T10TD4179E:36a-12: da ni drag po'i me dag gis //
T10TD4179E:36a-13: rgyun mi 'chad par sreg pas na //
T10TD4179E:36a-14: gang phyir skad ni drag 'byin pas //
T10TD4179E:36a-15: de phyir de dag du 'bod yin //
T10TD4179E:36a-16: gang gi lha dang bram ze dang //
T10TD4179E:36a-17: bla ma'i rdzas 'phrog sdug bsngal byas //
T10TD4179E:36a-18: gang ngag gtams pa 'phrog byed pa //
T10TD4179E:36a-20: mes sreg ba ni drag phyir dang //
T10TD4179E:36a-21: du 'bod pa yang che phyir dang //
T10TD4179E:36a-22: lci zhing che ba nyid kyi phyir //
T10TD4179E:36a-23: de ni du 'bod chen po yin //
T10TD4179E:36a-24: yon tan dag gis che ba la //
T10TD4179E:36a-25: gnod pa drag po byas pa las //
T10TD4179E:36a-26: pha ma bla ma bsad byas pa //
T10TD4179E:36a-27: nges par bskal bar mnar med 'tshed //
T10TD4179E:36a-28: me drag der ni lus dag gi / rus pa dag kyang lhags par 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:36a-29: gang phyir bde ba'i skabs med pa //
T10TD4179E:36a-30: de phyir mnar med yin par bshad //
T10TD4179E:36a-31: lus can gang dag gcig la gcig / gnod par dga' bas g-yul ngor gsod //
T10TD4179E:36a-32: sdig can de dag sdug bsngal dang //
T10TD4179E:36a-33: ldan pa'i ral gri'i sems can skye //
T10TD4179E:36a-34: gang phyir de yi sen mo ni //
T10TD4179E:36a-35: lcags byas 'bar rno de dag gis //
T10TD4179E:36a-36: gcig gis gcig gsod gang yin des //
T10TD4179E:36a-37: ral gri rtse mo can du bshad ;
T10TD4179E:36a-38: / byi bo byed pa shal ma ri //
T10TD4179E:36a-39: lcags kyi rtse mo rtse mo 'bar //
T10TD4179E:36a-40: sor ni bcu drug yod pa la //
T10TD4179E:36a-43: mchu rno lus chen 'bar ba yis //
T10TD4179E:36a-44: gzhan gyi lus med 'phrog pa la //
T10TD4179E:36a-46: bag phab pa la gnod byed mi //
T10TD4179E:36a-47: nags tshal ral gri 'dab can du //
T10TD4179E:36a-48: gtubs byas du zhing bya rgod khyi //
T10TD4179E:36a-50: gang dag gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa //
T10TD4179E:36a-51: de dag lcags kyi thu lum ni //
T10TD4179E:36a-52: tsha ba dag kyang za ba dang //
T10TD4179E:36b-0: yang dang yang du zangs bskol @36b 'thung ;
T10TD4179E:36b-1: / rtag tu rngon la dga' ba gang //
T10TD4179E:36b-2: lo ni bye bar du zhing yang //
T10TD4179E:36b-3: khyi ni lcags kyi mche ba can //
T10TD4179E:36b-4: mi srun shin tu dbang med za //
T10TD4179E:36b-5: chu skyes nya la sogs bsad na //
T10TD4179E:36b-6: chu bo rab med 'bar ba yi //
T10TD4179E:36b-7: zangs kyi chu bo'i chur 'gro zhing //
T10TD4179E:36b-8: mi de mes kyang bsreg par 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:36b-9: gang zhig rang don tsam rmongs nas //
T10TD4179E:36b-10: chos dang mi ldan shags 'gyed nas //
T10TD4179E:36b-11: sems can dmyal bar de du zhing //
T10TD4179E:36b-13: 'di la gang gis gzugs can la //
T10TD4179E:36b-14: gnod pa rnam pa mang byas pa //
T10TD4179E:36b-15: de dag yun ring 'khor lo dang //
T10TD4179E:36b-17: gang zhig chos kyi stegs 'jig cing //
T10TD4179E:36b-18: yang dag ma yin lam smra ba'i //
T10TD4179E:36b-19: mi de dag ni spu gri'i sos //
T10TD4179E:36b-21: son mos shig la sogs bcom na //
T10TD4179E:36b-22: de dag lus ni cher 'gyur la //
T10TD4179E:36b-23: ston brgyar yang dang yang du ni //
T10TD4179E:36b-25: gang zhig brtul zhugs bzang mnos nas //
T10TD4179E:36b-26: legs par srung bar mi byed na //
T10TD4179E:36b-27: de ni nges par sha dang rus //
T10TD4179E:36b-28: 'jigs pa'i me mar mur du bsreg / gang du 'tsho ba log pa ni //
T10TD4179E:36b-29: cung zad kyis kyang 'tsho byed pa //
T10TD4179E:36b-30: de ni rkyag 'jim nub gyur nas //
T10TD4179E:36b-31: srin po rnams kyis za bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:36b-33: srog mthong nas ni 'joms pa gang //
T10TD4179E:36b-34: de ni lcags kyi gtun shing gis //
T10TD4179E:36b-35: yang dang yang du brdung bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:36b-36: shin tu khro zhing gtum pa dang //
T10TD4179E:36b-37: g-yo byed brdzun du smra ba dang //
T10TD4179E:36b-38: gzhan la gnod byed dga' ba ni //
T10TD4179E:36b-39: gshin rje'i srin bor skye bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:36b-40: sdug bsngal kun gyi sa bon ni //
T10TD4179E:36b-41: chung du la sogs dbye ba yis //
T10TD4179E:36b-42: lus ngag yid kyi sdig ba ste //
T10TD4179E:36b-43: de ni pha yang spang bar bya //
T10TD4179E:36b-44: sems can dmyal ba'i rabs rdzogs so /
T10TD4179E:36b-46: // /'dod chags kyis ni rmongs pa dag / ngang pa phug ron la sogs dang //
T10TD4179E:36b-47: bong bu 'dod chags can rnams kyi //
T10TD4179E:36b-48: skye gnas srin sogs skye gnas te //
T10TD4179E:36b-49: khong khro 'dzin pas sprul du skye //
T10TD4179E:36b-50: nga rgyal khengs sems seng ger 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:36b-51: che ba yi ni nga rgyal gyis //
T10TD4179E:36b-52: khyi dang bong bu'i skye gnas te //
T10TD4179E:36b-53: ser sna phrag dog la sogs pa'i //
T10TD4179E:36b-54: skyon gyis lus can shi nas spre'u //
T10TD4179E:37a-0: @37a * // mu cor smra dang spyi brtol che //
T10TD4179E:37a-1: rang bzhin mi brtan khrar skye'o //
T10TD4179E:37a-2: gsod dang 'ching dang ser sna yis //
T10TD4179E:37a-3: lus can ba lang khyi la sogs //
T10TD4179E:37a-4: 'gyur ro mi srun las kyis ni //
T10TD4179E:37a-5: sdom dang sdig pa mi sdug skye //
T10TD4179E:37a-6: khro dang ser sna can gyi mi //
T10TD4179E:37a-7: shi nas sha ni za byed pa //
T10TD4179E:37a-8: stag dang spre'u wa dang dom //
T10TD4179E:37a-9: bya rgod spyang ki la sogs skye //
T10TD4179E:37a-10: mi srun khro gnyer sbyin byed mi //
T10TD4179E:37a-12: gtong zhing khro dang dregs pa yis //
T10TD4179E:37a-13: nam mkha' lding gi dbang phyug che //
T10TD4179E:37a-14: rang gi lus dang ngag yid kyis //
T10TD4179E:37a-15: sdig pa'i las ni gang byas pa //
T10TD4179E:37a-16: de ni dud 'gror skye bas na //
T10TD4179E:37a-17: de ni chung yang ma byed cig / dud 'gro'i rabs rdzogs so /
T10TD4179E:37a-19: // / rtse log can gang sbyin pa spangs //
T10TD4179E:37a-20: bza' dang bca' ba spong byed pa //
T10TD4179E:37a-21: de dag yi dags lus srul bo //
T10TD4179E:37a-22: ro rnams za bar byed par skye //
T10TD4179E:37a-24: sred pas 'drid par byed pa de //
T10TD4179E:37a-25: khong gi dri ma za byed pa'i //
T10TD4179E:37a-26: lus srul por ni skye bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37a-27: mi gang spyod pa dman pa gang //
T10TD4179E:37a-28: shin tu zhum dang ser sna dang //
T10TD4179E:37a-29: rtag tu 'dod byed de shi nas //
T10TD4179E:37a-30: yi dags wa ba can du skye //
T10TD4179E:37a-31: gang zhig ci yang mi ster la //
T10TD4179E:37a-32: sbyin pa zlog par byed pa de //
T10TD4179E:37a-33: yi dags bkres pas rnyongs pa zhes //
T10TD4179E:37a-34: gsus che kha ni khab tsam 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37a-35: gang zhig spyod dang sbyin mi byed //
T10TD4179E:37a-36: rigs kyi don du nor srung na //
T10TD4179E:37a-37: de ni yi dags mtshan gtor spyod //
T10TD4179E:37a-38: shin tu bsngos sa der skye'o //
T10TD4179E:37a-40: byin nas 'gyod par byed pa de //
T10TD4179E:37a-41: shi nas mchil ma skyugs pa la //
T10TD4179E:37a-42: bra bar byed pa'i yi dags skye //
T10TD4179E:37a-43: gang zhig khros pas mi snyan smra //
T10TD4179E:37a-44: mtshang 'bru ba ni smra byed pa //
T10TD4179E:37a-45: las des shin tu yun ring bar //
T10TD4179E:37a-47: gang zhig 'thab mo byed pa dang //
T10TD4179E:37a-48: ma chags sems ni khro byed pa //
T10TD4179E:37a-49: de ni yi dags me 'bar ma //
T10TD4179E:37a-50: srin dang sdig sprul phye leb za //
T10TD4179E:37a-51: gang zhig grong bcas 'bebs shing ster //
T10TD4179E:37a-52: byin zhing gnod par byed pa de //
T10TD4179E:37a-53: grul bum byad ni mi sdug pa //
T10TD4179E:37a-55: zas kyi ched du brtse med pas //
T10TD4179E:37a-56: srog chags bsad cing sbyin med gang //
T10TD4179E:37a-57: de dag shi nas nges par ni //
T10TD4179E:37b-0: @37b srin po'i bza' dang bca' bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37b-1: rtag tu dri dang phreng la dga' //
T10TD4179E:37b-2: sbyin byed khro ba chung ba ni //
T10TD4179E:37b-3: lha rnams dga' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba //
T10TD4179E:37b-4: dri za rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37b-5: gang zhig kha cig phra ma che //
T10TD4179E:37b-6: khro zhing dgos pa'i ched sbyin na //
T10TD4179E:37b-7: de ni sha za ma rungs nyid //
T10TD4179E:37b-8: bzhin mi sdug par skye bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37b-9: rtag tu rab sdang rtags bag can //
T10TD4179E:37b-10: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa dang //
T10TD4179E:37b-11: rtag tu sbyin la dga' ba ni //
T10TD4179E:37b-12: de dag shi nas 'byung por skye //
T10TD4179E:37b-13: ma rungs khro zhing sbyin byed la //
T10TD4179E:37b-14: chang zhim dag la dga' ba'i ni //
T10TD4179E:37b-15: shi nas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa //
T10TD4179E:37b-16: chang la dga' ba rnams su skye //
T10TD4179E:37b-17: gang dag pha ma bla ma rnams //
T10TD4179E:37b-19: de dag gzhal med khang rgyu ba'i //
T10TD4179E:37b-20: gnod sbyin bde ba ldan par skye //
T10TD4179E:37b-21: sred dang ser sna'i skyon gyis ni //
T10TD4179E:37b-22: shi nas yi dags skye bar 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37b-23: nyon mongs can dges gnod sbyin sogs //
T10TD4179E:37b-24: de phyir de ni spab bar bya //
T10TD4179E:37b-25: yi dags kyi rabs rdzogs so /
T10TD4179E:37b-27: // / mi 'tshe ba yi lha dang mi //
T10TD4179E:37b-28: lha min rnams su tshe ring 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37b-30: de phyir 'tshe ba rnam par spungs //
T10TD4179E:37b-31: mdze dang smon pa zad byed mi //
T10TD4179E:37b-32: mi nad gzhan yang gang dag yin //
T10TD4179E:37b-33: 'byung po rnams la bsad dang bcings ;
T10TD4179E:37b-34: / brdeg par byas pa rnams kyis 'byung //
T10TD4179E:37b-35: gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog cing //
T10TD4179E:37b-36: ci yang sbyin par mi byed pa //
T10TD4179E:37b-37: de ni 'bad pa chen pos kyang //
T10TD4179E:37b-38: rdzas na rnyed par mi nus so //
T10TD4179E:37b-39: gang zhig rdzas ni ma byin bar //
T10TD4179E:37b-40: len ba sbyin ba sbyin byed pa //
T10TD4179E:37b-41: de ni rdzas dang ldan gyur la ;
T10TD4179E:37b-42: / phyis nas de ni med par 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37b-43: mi gang mi 'phrogs sbyin mi byed //
T10TD4179E:37b-44: ha cang 'jungs pa ma yin ba //
T10TD4179E:37b-45: de dag tshigs ni chen po yis //
T10TD4179E:37b-46: nges par rdzas ni brten pa thob //
T10TD4179E:37b-47: gang zhig gzhan gyi nor mi 'phrogs //
T10TD4179E:37b-48: gtong dang ldan zhing ser sna spangs //
T10TD4179E:37b-49: mi de rdzas ni mi 'phrogs pa ;
T10TD4179E:37b-50: rgya chen yid du 'ong ba thob //
T10TD4179E:37b-51: gang zhig 'di la rdzas sbyin pa //
T10TD4179E:37b-52: tshe dang mdog dang stobs ldan zhing //
T10TD4179E:37b-53: dpal dang ldan zhing nad spangs pa //
T10TD4179E:37b-54: rtag par bde dang ldan par 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:37b-55: gang zhig gos ni sbyin byed pa //
T10TD4179E:37b-56: 'dzem bcas gzugs bzang longs spyod ldan //
T10TD4179E:38b-1: bkur byed stong ldan bzod par byed //
T10TD4179E:38b-2: 'thab mo la ni dga' ba dang //
T10TD4179E:38b-3: de ni sum cu rtsa gsum skye //
T10TD4179E:38b-4: rtsod la mi dga' 'thab mo la //
T10TD4179E:38b-5: yid ni dga' bar mi byed la //
T10TD4179E:38b-6: gcig tu dge la brtson ba gang //
T10TD4179E:38b-8: thos pa mang dang chos 'dzin dang //
T10TD4179E:38b-9: shes rab ldan zhing thar pa 'dod //
T10TD4179E:38b-10: yon tan rnams la dga' ba'i mi //
T10TD4179E:38b-11: de dag dga' ldan nye bar 'gro //
T10TD4179E:38b-12: mi gang rang nyid dul ba la //
T10TD4179E:38b-13: zhugs shing tshul khrims 'bogs pa la //
T10TD4179E:38b-14: spro ba che dang ldan pa de //
T10TD4179E:38b-15: gdon mi za bar 'phru la dgar 'gro //
T10TD4179E:38b-16: sems can gang zhig sman min mchog / sbyin dang dul dang yang dag bsdoms //
T10TD4179E:38b-17: phul byung yon tan lhag gyur te //
T10TD4179E:38b-18: nges par gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do //
T10TD4179E:38b-19: tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris thob //
T10TD4179E:38b-20: bsam gtan gyis ni khyad par 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:38b-21: yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes pas //
T10TD4179E:38b-22: mthar ni yang srid med par 'gyur //
T10TD4179E:38b-23: mi dge bas ni bde mi thob //
T10TD4179E:38b-24: dge ba yis ni bde ba 'thob //
T10TD4179E:38b-25: de ltar dge dang mi dge ba'i //
T10TD4179E:38b-26: las kyi 'bras bu gsal bar bstan //
T10TD4179E:38b-27: sdug pa dang ni bral ba dang //
T10TD4179E:38b-28: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang //
T10TD4179E:38b-29: las rnams rang gi 'bras bur bcas //
T10TD4179E:38b-30: 'chi dang rga dang na ba nyid //
T10TD4179E:38b-31: gsum po 'di dag bsam par bya //
T10TD4179E:38b-32: de lta na ni chags bral thob //
T10TD4179E:38b-33: chags dang bral na bsod nams 'dod //
T10TD4179E:38b-34: de bzhin sdig pa spong bar byed //
T10TD4179E:38b-35: de dag nyid kyang mdor nyon cig / bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed dang //
T10TD4179E:38b-36: gzhan la gnod byed spong ba ni //
T10TD4179E:38b-37: bsod nams bzlog pa sdig yin par //
T10TD4179E:38b-38: bdag nyid chen pos de skad gsungs //
T10TD4179E:38b-41: // / dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'gro ba drug gi tshig le'ur byas pa /
T10TD4179E:38b-42: slob dpon btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T10TD4179E:38b-45: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharm'a ka ra dang //
T10TD4179E:38b-46: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba gtsang de ben tra rakshitas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
